ARABIC: وَمَا لِىَ لَآ أَعْبُدُ ٱلَّذِى فَطَرَنِى وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Why indeed should I not worship Him Who brought me into being, Him to Whom you will be returned?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Why should I not worship Him who brought me into being, to whom you will be brought back in the end?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Why should I not serve the One Who created me and to Whom all of you shall be sent back?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Why should I not worship God who has created me? To him you will all return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And what is the matter with me that I should not worship Him Who created me, whereas it is towards Him that you are to return?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And why should I not worship Him Who has created me and to Whom you shall be returned."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And what reason have I that I should not serve Him Who brought me into existence? And to Him you shall be brought back;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And why should I not serve Him who originated me, and unto whom you shall be returned?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: For what cause should I not serve Him Who hath created me, and unto Whom ye will be brought back?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Why should I not worship Him who has brought me into being, and to whom you shall all be recalled?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And what aileth me that I should not worship Him who hath created me, and Unto whom ye shall be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Why should I not worship Him who has originated me, and to whom you shall be brought back?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It would not be reasonable in me if I did not serve Him Who created me, and to Whom ye shall (all) be brought back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And why should I not worship Him (Allah Alone) Who has created me and to Whom you shall be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Why should I not worship Him who has originated me and to whom you shall all be returned?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “And why should I not worship Him Who created me, and to Whom you will be returned?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And why should I not worship He who created me and to whom you will be returned?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:22]   And why should I not worship Him Who originated me, [Him Who] created me — in other words: there is nothing to prevent me from worshipping Him when the necessitating factors for this exist, and the same applies to you — and to Whom you shall be returned?, after death, whereupon He will requite you for your disbelief.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And he said to them in reply: (For what cause should I not serve Him Who hath created me, and unto Whom ye will be brought back) after you die?
